snippet.title: Dead Faces Trailer
snippet.description:
Dead Faces - Upcoming psychological horror game by Aza Game Studio.
Wish-list on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2822770/Dead_Faces/
Prologue Demo Now Available: https://azagamestudio.itch.io/dead-faces & At https://store.steampowered.com/app/2822770/Dead_Faces/
A Mind Bending Psychological Horror - Live through each day in your apartment as your hallucinations increase everyday.

                                                     S T O R Y      

The days seem to blend together as you slowly forget the world outside your apartment. Visions of people you've known begin to plague you through increasingly worse hallucinations.  Explore and live through each day in your apartment and face your past as you gradually lose your grasp on reality to reclaim your memories.

                                                            F E A T U R E S                

    Live through multiple days in your apartment as it changes each day.
    A randomized dynamic hallucination system
    Atmospheric realistic setting using photo realism and photo scanned materials.
    Random generated audio system, thunder system and dynamic events.
    A twisted macabre story surrounding the main character and his past that unfolds slowly as you explore the apartment
    Themes of Depression, Suicide

Follow: Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzaGameStudio
www.azagamestudio.com
Sountrack composed and produced by "Vivek Abhishek"
https://www.youtube.com/@VIVEKABHISHEK
